resources.string: How many cigarettes do you smoke a day?
What is the price of your cigarette box?
※It is calculated based on the theory that the lifetime will shrink 5 minutes 30 seconds per one.
Reset Non Smoking Start Date. OK?

string-array.name: array_comment
string-array.item: Let\’s keep up the good work!
Let\'s keep it up until it passes 3 days, 3 weeks, and 3 years!
We are on your side! Please go on like this!
You have saved a lot!
I hope you live even longer.
Your body must be protected by you!
Smoke from just one cigarette destroies everything.Be careful!
One smoke here ruins everything.
Just one tobacco is enough to devastate you. Be careful!
Good job! Please do your best!
Don\'t you think meals taste good?
Please feel relaxed and keep on going!
Non smoking is good for beauty.
Non smoking is good for health and wallet!
Your teeth will not be tainted with tar anymore!
Let\'s boast your endurance to your friends!
Your patience is amazing!
I admire those who can quit smoking.
You have a highly good self-control. Fighting!
When you feel like smoking, please chew gum and hang on!
You are great, not smoking while people around you are smoking!
Did you find any stress relief method other than cigarettes?
You do not get short of breath even if you go up stairs!
Do you not think you skin is in good condition?
Keep it up and let\'s finish smoking!
Females can sense the difference of fitting make-up!
I hear that if you quit smoking you can easily wake up.
It is said that thorny throat goes away.
Did you have a comfortable sleep?
Is your sleep getting better?
You are the only one who can keep you in a good health!
You will soon wake up feeling good!
Those people who love challenging themselves are awesome!
Lung cleaning is available depending on your choice!
Now you can have a meal at a nonsmoking seat confidently!
Have a sound sleep until the morning! Those day will never end!.
You are not troubling anyone beside you by secondhand smoke!
You don\'t have to look for the vending machine around there.
You do not have to carry a light anymore!
